author: Michelle Nichols
title: U.N. warns economic downturn could kill hundreds of thousands of children in 2020
description: Hundreds of thousands of children could die this year due to the global economic downturn sparked by the coronavirus pandemic and tens of millions more could fall into extreme poverty as a result of the crisis, the United Nations warned on Thursday.
